verses.name: John 11:6
verses.text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.

verses.name: John 11:7
verses.text: Then after that saith he to his disciples, Let us go into Judea again.

verses.name: John 11:8
verses.text: His disciples say unto him, Master, the Jews of late sought to stone thee; and goest thou thither again?

verses.name: John 11:9
verses.text: Jesus answered, Are there not twelve hours in the day? If any man walk in the day, he stumbleth not, because he seeth the light of this world.

verses.name: John 11:10
verses.text: But if a man walk in the night, he stumbleth, because there is no light in him.
